record.name: Accuracy
record.description: While the weapon has power, the character wielding it gains +1 on his attack rolls with it.

record.name: Aegis
record.description: While the armor has power, the character wearing it is immune to continuous effects.

record.name: Arcane Force
record.description: While the weapon has power, it gains +2 POW. On a critical hit, the attacking character can slam the character hit instead of rolling damage normally. The character hit is slammed d6? directly away from the attacker and suffers a damage roll with POW equal to the attacker's STR plus the POW of this weapon. The POW of collateral damage is equal to the attacker's STR.

record.name: Balefire
record.description: While the weapon has power, it gains boosted damage against undead characters.

record.name: Blast
record.description: While the weapon has power, the character wielding it can attack with the weapon normally or can give the weapon AOE 3.

record.name: Blessed
record.description: While the weapon has power, attacks with it ignore spell effects that add to the target's DEF and ARM.

record.name: Bond Plate
record.description: This is a runeplate specially designed to enable a warcaster to bond with a mechanikal weapon. While a weapon the warcaster is bonded to has power, the warcaster can boost attack and damage rolls with the weapon.

record.name: Cold
record.description: While the weapon has power, it gains +1 POW. On a critical hit, a target without Immunity: Cold becomes stationary for one round.

record.name: Compensator
record.description: While the armor has power, reduce the DEF penalty of the armor by 1.

record.name: Corruption
record.description: While the weapon has power, characters it hits suffer the Corrosion continuous effect.

record.name: Disbinder
record.description: While the weapon has power, upkeep spells on characters it hits immediately expire.

record.name: Electrocutioner
record.description: While the weapon has power, it gains +1 POW and steamjacks it hits suffer Disruption. (A steamjack suffering Disruption loses its focus points and cannot be allocated focus or channel spells for one round)

record.name: Flame
record.description: While the weapon has power, it gains +1 POW. On a critical hit, the target suffers the Fire continuous effect.

record.name: Fleet
record.description: While the armor has power, the character wearing it gains +1 SPD and DEF.

record.name: Grievous Wounds
record.description: While the weapon has power, characters it hits lose Tough, cannot heal or be healed, and cannot transfer damage for one round.

record.name: Halo of Fire
record.description: While the armor or shield has power, the character carrying the shield or wearing the armor gains Immunity: Fire. While the runeplate is active, the character can make a quick action to unleash a burning field around himself. For one round, any character hitting him with a melee attack suffers the Fire continuous effect. If this runeplate is set into a shield, only attackers in the character's front arc suffer the damage roll and continuous effect.

record.name: Heightened Strength
record.description: While the armor has power, the character wearing it gains +1 STR.

record.name: Light
record.runetype: Melee Weapon, Ranged Weapon, or Armor
record.description: While the item has power, it can provide light (p. 225) in a large area around the character carrying the weapon or wearing the armor. The light can be turned on or off as a quick action.

record.name: Mechanikal Seizure
record.description: While the weapon has power, steamjacks it hits become stationary for one round.

record.name: Quicken
record.description: While the armor has power, once per turn the character wearing it can immediately advance up to twelve feet (2") as a quick action.

record.name: Repulsor
record.description: While the shield has power, a character hit by it is pushed 1" directly away from the attacker. While the shield has power, when the character wielding the shield is hit with a melee attack made by a character in his front arc, after the attack is resolved the attacker is pushed 1? directly away from him.

record.name: Silencer
record.description: While the weapon has power, attacks made with the weapon make no sound.

record.name: Spell Ward
record.description: While the armor has power, the character wearing it cannot be targeted by spells.

record.name: Stall
record.description: While the weapon has power, it gains +1 POW. Steamjacks hit by this weapon suffer the Stall continuous effect. (While a steamjack is suffering Stall, its base DEF becomes 7 and it cannot run or charge.)

record.name: Steady
record.description: While the armor has power, the character wearing it cannot be knocked down.
